content: How does one define "connection" for this?  Co-authors is fairly well-defined.  Co-stars (Bacon Game) is less well-defined since a "co-star" might not even share a scene with the other "co-star" and still count.  Calling "connected" vague would be an understatement.  If I rode on a bus with someone, are we "connected" in terms of the degrees of separation?  I was at the inauguration with a million or so people, are we connected?
